page.title: 11LIFE STYLES
page.content: Lifestyle of children and parents measured as a percentage of how we spent our free time: SPORT/MUSIC # The graph shows THEATRE ETC. # that we spend 21% of HOMEWORK # our time outside the COMPUTER PLAY ## home and the rest LIBRARY ETC. ## indoors. INDOOR PLAY ## In total we spend HOBBIES ### 24% of our time STREETPLAY ### watching TV screens. SHOPPING ### Much of the 4% WATCH VIDEO #### worship time was by WORSHIP #### children in mosques.
